# Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(devtools)
```

```{r}
top_artists <- read_csv("top_artists.csv")
top_artists

top_100_songs <- read_csv("top_100_most_streamed_songs_on_spotify_updated.csv")
top_100_songs
```

# Tidying Data

```{r}
# Joining the datasets
test1 <- top_artists |>
  filter(name == "The Weeknd") |>
  rename(`Artist Popularity` = popularity)

test2 <- top_100_songs |>
  rename(name = `Artist Name(s)`, `Song Popularity` = Popularity) |>
  filter(name == "The Weeknd")

test3 <- test1 |>
  inner_join(
    test2,
    by = join_by(name)
  ) |>
  arrange(`Song Popularity`)
test3


prepped_top_100_songs <- top_100_songs |>
  rename(name = `Artist Name(s)`, popularity = Popularity) |>
  select(-`Added By`)

tidy_song_artists <- top_artists |>
  inner_join(
    prepped_top_100_songs,
    by = join_by(name)
  ) |>
  arrange(popularity)

tidy_song_artists
```
